about_the_game:
This is the Demo version of REVENGE CRYSTAL. In this demo, you will play through the first chapter of the game. Dive into the world, test your skills, and prepare for the epic journey ahead.

Story and Game World

🔸 The Beginning: You will start in The Forgotten Prison, where you must escape and make your way to The Ruins of the First Encounter, the safe zone in the game world.

📖 Story: The demo presents the beginning of the main story, allowing you to explore the game world and its characters.

🗣️ Interactive NPCs: You will encounter several NPCs to interact with in both The Forgotten Prison and The Ruins of the First Encounter.

⏳ Playtime: The average playtime is around 40 minutes.

🔮 Spells and Items

- There are 3 types of spells and over 25 items available for experimentation in the first area of the demo.

- You can upgrade weapons at the blacksmith in The Ruins of the First Encounter.

- In The Ruins of the First Encounter, a special magic stone grants you items each time you step on it (available only in the demo).

- Elements (🔥 Fire, ❄️ Ice, 🌑 Darkness, ⚡ Lightning) are available from the start, allowing you to experiment with spell fusion mechanics.

- After defeating the first boss, you will find special items to test new combat and exploration mechanics.

⚔️ Enemies and Bosses

- 6 types of enemies (Prison Guards).

- 1 Mini Boss: The Executioner.

- 3 Main Bosses:

  • The first boss is in the first area.

  • The second and third bosses can be accessed through the Crystal Gate in The Ruins of the First Encounter.

- The cutscenes for the second and third bosses have been removed in the demo to avoid story spoilers.

- This is not their actual order in the full game—there are other bosses before them.

🌍 Language Support

- The demo supports both Arabic and English for texts and dialogues.

- You can switch languages at any time during gameplay.

- The current voice lines in conversations are for testing purposes only.

- Once development is complete, we will evaluate whether to use AI-generated voices or collaborate with voice actors for the final version.

- Additional language support will be added after the game’s development is complete.

🎯 Demo Objective

The demo aims to showcase the game’s mechanics and world, so we look forward to hearing your feedback and suggestions to improve the experience and further develop the game!

⚠️ Notes

- The demo may contain some technical issues, so please help us by reporting any bugs you encounter.

- The game supports both controllers and mouse & keyboard, but we recommend using a controller for the best experience.

❝Revenge and Correcting Old Sins Come Together in One Entity❞

Revenge Crystal is an epic top-down action RPG. You explore a defeated world by unknown invaders as an amnesiac knight who must save the world and defeat the invaders by navigating through a world of interconnected challenges, fierce enemies, and intricate puzzles.

KEY FEATURES:

  • Discover a rich, diverse world, bursting with secrets and dangers in every unique environment.

  • Engage in epic battles with fierce enemies and powerful bosses, testing your combat skills to the max.

  • Wield magical spells with the option to enhance them with elemental powers for devastating effects.

  • Embark on intriguing side quests that deepen the lore and add layers to your adventure.

  • Craft your own journey, making choices that determine your path and the challenges you face.

  • Customize your character to suit your playstyle, evolving skills and abilities to conquer your foes.

STORY:

In a darkened cell, an unknown knight wakes up after a long sleep, on a strange call commands him to end this nightmare. He has no memory of his past, and his body is affected by strange crystals. He starts his journey in a destroyed world under control of unknown invaders. He attempts to find out who he is and why he feels the need for revenge. During his journey filled with challenges and enemies everywhere, he will be forced to face his past secrets and the sins of his people, known as the "Crystallne", who caused the destruction of several worlds.
